remarks: Lemma for ~ dfon2 .  A transitive class of sets satisfying the new definition satisfies the new definition.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 25-Feb-2011.)
statement:
dfon2lem6 $p |- ( ( Tr S /\ A. x e. S A. z ( ( z C. x /\ Tr z ) -> z e. x ) ) -> A. y ( ( y C. S /\ Tr y ) -> y e. S ) ) $.
$d S x y z $.
